Sonata in G major, Hob. XVI:6

1766 · Landon 13

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 15'

  • 1. Allegro
  • 2. Minuet – Trio
  • 3. Adagio
  • 4. Finale: Allegro molto

1. Allegro

A version of this movement is used as the first movement of the divertimento in G major for piano and strings (Hob. XIV:6).

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. Minuet – Trio

A version of this movement is used as the third movement of the divertimento in G major for piano and strings (Hob. XIV:6).

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

3. Adagio

A version of this movement is used as the second movement of the divertimento in G major for piano and strings (Hob. XIV:6).

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2

4. Finale: Allegro molto

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2
